desc: Specify the configuration file to read.  (default: /etc/avahi/avahi-daemon
Log to syslog instead of STDERR.  Implied by --daemonize
Don't enforce resource limits as specified in the configuration file
Don't drop root privileges after startup and don't require daemon to be startâ€¦
Don't change the process name while running
Kill an already running avahi-daemon.  (equivalent to sending a SIGTERM)
Tell an already running avahi-daemon to reread /etc/resolv
Return 0 as return code when avahi-daemon is already running
